title: I have a brand new 3a but having to have the screen brightness at 85% my old Samsung S7 50% was olk
content: I have a new 3a but having to have the screen brightness on at 85% On my old Samsung S7 50% was more than enough. At 50% the Pixel looks dull and washed out. Also on lock screen it used 10%  battery in just 6 hours
